snippet: Josh Hamilton homered and had four runs batted in as Texas held on to beat Boston after losing a 9-5 lead.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Texas Rangers defeat Boston Red Sox, 10-9; Rangers outfielder Josh Hamilton hits his 30th home run of the season; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Josh Hamilton homered and had four runs batted in as Texas held on to beat Boston after losing a 9-5 lead.

headline.seo: Hamilton and Rangers Win Slugfest at Fenway
headline.main: Hamilton and Rangers Win Slugfest at Fenway
headline.print_headline: Hamilton and Rangers Win Slugfest at Fenway
